5 CRITICAL LESSONS FROM THE BOOK "ATOMIC HABITS"

1. "Every action you take is a vote for the person you wish to become."

2. "Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement."

3. "Your habits shape your identity, and your identity shapes your habits."

4. "Too often we convince ourselves that massive results require massive action."

5. "Changes that seem small and unimportant at first will compound and turn into remarkable results if youâ€™re willing to stick with them for years."

#books #bookstagram #bookoftheday #readers #bookblogger #learning #everydaybook #writers #writersofinstagram

Every Day
By: David Levithan

Condition: like new 
Paperback 
Genre: romance/ contemporary 

Overview: 
Every day a different body. Every day a different life. Every day in love with the same girl.
Thereâ€™s never any warning about where it will be or who it will be. A has made peace with that, even established guidelines by which to live: Never get too attached. Avoid being noticed. Do not interfere.

Itâ€™s all fine until the morning that A wakes up in the body of Justin and meets Justinâ€™s girlfriend, Rhiannon. From that moment, the rules by which A has been living no longer apply. Because finally A has found someone A wants to be withâ€”day in, day out, day after day.

DM for more info.

Peggy Perry Anderson

The thirst: Jo nesbo
A woman is found murdered after an internet date. The marks left on her body show the police that they are dealing with a particularly vicious killer. Under pressure from the media to find the murderer, the force know there's only one man for the job. But Harry Hole is reluctant to return to the place that almost took everything from him.

âœ¨Everyday Books.  One of my favorite and most used types of journaling.  You can stick anything and everything in these, from wrapping from orders, keepsakes, song lyrics, recipes, happy mail, etc.  They are whatever you want them to be, and each page is a completely new adventure. Cosa fanno i dinosauri ğŸ¦– quando Ã¨ ora di dormire?

Ho preparato per Dalia e Viola un nuovo invito al gioco basato su un libro preso in biblioteca e che ci Ã¨ piaciuto tantissimo. 
Di questa serie ho scoperto esistere tanti libri su diverse situazioni come il mangiare o i capricci etc. 
Idea geniale accostare i dinosauri, animale notoriamente amato dai bambini, con alcune situazioni che li possono mettere a dura prova come il dormire o mangiare.
Il gioco Ã¨ stato molto semplice, la nostra casa delle bambole, i dinosauri @lankakade, lettini, copertine e pupazzetti di @play_tive_ ma vi garantisco che le ha tenute molto impegnate e le ha divertite tanto. 
Voi conoscevate questi libri?piacciono i dinosauri ai vostri bimbi?

Cosa fanno i dinosauri quando Ã¨ ora di dormire di Jane Yolen e Mark Teague de @ilcastorolibri

I did a thing...

I had my book signing event last weekend and it was beautiful. 
It was great receiving all the love and support. 

Also having family come from out of town whose been on this road of life with me. 

 Dating Me has been one of the best things I've done for myself.
